title: How about you "Pros" ban Sejuani?
body:
SO you stop losing to her every single pro match. I mean, a beginner could aim her ult it is so drooling out the mouth easy, and it aoe stuns.

Come on "Pros", wake up.

Team with sejuani 6 wins, other team 0 wins, so far this weekend.

You guys don't even have skill, you are just picking sejuani and rolling your face on your keyboard.

Come on "Pros" pick champions that aren't difficulty ranking EXTREMELY EASY.

replies.body: This topic is bad and you should be ashamed.
